data.question: What is the empirical formula of TIFSIX-1-Cu?
What method was used for absorption correction in the synthesis of TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the crystal system of SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the BET surface area of TIFSIX-1-Cu compared to SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
data.answer: TIFSIX-1-Cu has a BET surface area of 1690 m^2/g, which is higher than SNIFSIX-1-Cu's 1523 m^2/g.

data.question: Is the CO2 uptake of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 1 atm higher than that of SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the CO2/CH4 relative uptake of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 298 K and 1 atm?
Does SNIFSIX-1-Cu exhibit higher CO2/CH4 selectivity at 1 atm compared to SIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the primary CO2 adsorption site in TIFSIX-1-Cu according to modeling studies?
data.answer: The primary adsorption site is located at the pillar equatorial fluorine atoms.

data.question: Is the CO2/N2 IAST selectivity of TIFSIX-1-Cu higher than that of SNIFSIX-1-Cu at 1 atm?
What technique was used to collect single crystal X-ray diffraction data for TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
data.answer: Bruker-AXS SMART APEX/CCD diffractometer using CuKα radiation

data.question: What is the role of the bipyridine in the structure of TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
data.answer: Bipyridine acts as a linker forming square grid sheets.

data.question: Is the gas adsorption in TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu reversible?
What is the significance of the pillaring functionality in TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
data.answer: Tuning of the pillaring functionality leads to the enhancement of CO2–CH4 and/or CO2–N2 selectivity.

data.question: What is the CO2 uptake of SNIFSIX-1-Cu at 0.15 atm?
Does the substitution of Si4+ with Ti4+ in the pillar enhance the sorbent–CO2 interaction?
What is the formula weight of SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the crystal size of TIFSIX-1-Cu?
Is the BET surface area of SIFSIX-1-Cu lower than that of TIFSIX-1-Cu?
What is the CO2 Qst of TIFSIX-1-Cu at zero loading?
Are TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu synthesized in a single step from commercially available materials?
